name: Gyarados
author: Hasuno
flavor_text: It fires hyper beams in all directions, burning the surrounding area to ash. There are some regions where it’s called “the deity of destruction.”

attacks.name: Distilled Blast
attacks.effect: Reveal the top 7 cards of your deck. This attack does 30 more damage times the amount of {W} Energy you find there. Then, shuffle those Energy cards back into your deck and discard the other cards.

attacks.name: Hyper Beam
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy from your opponent’s Active Pokémon.
